full_summary:
### 2024 Tender Announcement: One (1) Agricultural Tractor

#### Procurement Details
* Reference Number: WS4266930313
* Solicitation Number: WS4266930313
* Publication Date: January 8, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2004, 14:00:00 EST

#### Procurement Overview
Public Services Procurement Canada has issued a demand for quotations to fulfill the following requirements:
* One (1) Agricultural Tractor with attachments

#### Delivery Requirements
* Requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 29, 2024

#### Supplier Requirements
* Suppliers must hold a supply arrangement (SA) under the request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A.
* Prospective suppliers desiring to become pre-qualified under this RFSA, are to refer to: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/ws4153305060-doc4153316176

#### Assessment Criteria
* The selection criteria shall be based on best value, which is to be determined by a combination of price and non-price factors.

#### Instructions for Bidders
* Bids shall be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Buyandsell procurement platform.
* Bidders must ensure that their bid includes all required supporting documentation.
* Bids submitted after the prescribed closing time of January 25, 2024, 14:00:00 EST, will be declared non-responsive.

#### Trade Agreements
* This procurement falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Delivery
* Quebec (except NCR)

#### Contact Information
* Name of Contact: Phillipe Schou
* Contact Email: phillipe.schou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Links
* Tender notice in French
* Ariba Discovery Posting Response Deadline and Buyandsell Posting Closing Time information

#### Notes
Please note that the requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 29, 2024. However, all further bidder instructions, documents, and response forms must be submitted on Canada's Open Government website. 

Amendments to the requirements may be posted in advance of the closing date at the Government of Canada's Buyandsell procurement platform, and on the request (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A.
